title: The Exchange: ‘Europe is a cesspool of deflationary forces’
description:
Yanis Varoufakis joins Rob Cox, global editor of Breakingviews,to talk about his new book, “And the Weak Suffer What They Must?”,the state of the EU, and the implications of a potential Brexit andTrump presidency.
 
 See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
